hero.title: Welcome to [Village Name]
hero.subtitle: A magical place along the Amazon

about.title: About the Village
about.description: Our village is located in the heart of the Amazon rainforest, where the river meets the jungle. We are a community of indigenous people who have lived here for generations, maintaining our traditional way of life through fishing, crafting, and sustainable living.

jungle_trek.title: Jungle Trek
jungle_trek.description: Guided tour through the rainforest with local guides.

piranha_fishing.title: Piranha Fishing
piranha_fishing.description: Try traditional piranha fishing techniques in the Amazon!

dolphin_swim.title: Swim with Pink Dolphins
dolphin_swim.description: Meet the famous pink dolphins on a river tour.

campfire.title: Campfire and Music
campfire.description: Local music, stories, and dance under the stars.

bird_watching.title: Bird Watching
bird_watching.description: Discover the incredible diversity of Amazonian birds.

canoe_tour.title: Canoe Tour
canoe_tour.description: Explore rivers and lakes in a traditional canoe.

culture.title: Culture & Lifestyle
culture.foodDescription: Discover our unique Amazonian dishes made with local ingredients
culture.musicDescription: Experience our traditional music and dance performances
culture.craftsDescription: Explore our handmade crafts and traditional art

support.title: How to Support
support.donationDescription: Support our community through financial contributions
support.volunteerDescription: Join us and help with education and community projects
support.tourismDescription: Visit us and experience authentic Amazonian life
